markdownRemark.html:
We are approximately 7.7 billion already, growing at a pace of XX milion per year. Our current system tries to sustain all of our needs - fruits and vegetables available even if out of season, massive land allocated to growing produce and herding farm animals for meat, clothing, construction materials, technological consumption and etc.

I find this very alarming due to the amount of resources needed to sustain our wants and needs. I was watching a short video done by Climate lab and Vox on food wastage.
